alert.note: Alert for Tate; Tunica (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 06 at 4:47PM CDT until April 07 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Coldwater River near Sarah For the Coldwater River...including Sarah, Marks...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Coldwater River near Sarah. * WHEN...From this afternoon to tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Low-lying farmland near the river begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 18.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 4:00 PM CDT Thursday was 18.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 18.5 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
